Plantation.Chula Vista Isles:
Chula Vista was a census-designated place (CDP) in Broward County, Florida, United States. The population was 573 at the 2000 census. It is now incorporated into Fort Lauderdale, as the neighborhood, "Chula Vista Isles."


== Geography ==
Chula Vista is located at 26°6′1″N 80°10′58″W (26.100364, -80.182890).
